alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 12:23PM EST until January 09 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 4 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE MADISON TAYLOR IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES TIFT THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DAY, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDING, HINES, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, JARROTT, JONESBORO, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, OLD TOWN, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, SUNSWEET, TEETERVILLE, TIFTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WATERLOO, WEBER, WESTWOOD, AND YELLOW JACKET.
